• Add favorites section

Now you can add the link of yoru sub-settings (server or filter) file to the favorites.
When you updated the contents of the link some where else, just tap the update in the Quantumult to easily update your settings.

• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• More compatible with iOS 11.
• Minor UI adjustment.

• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• More compatible with iOS 11.
• Minor UI adjustment.

• Widget updated, now you can switch working state from the widget, no need to open the container App.
• Add a new type of customized policy, 'static policy'.
• Add a new tab called 'switch' for iPhone, it will only appear if you create at least one static policy.

• Fix home view map clip issue(Right side of the map has been clipped a little bit in old versions). 
• Fix a UDP relay issue.

• Widget updated, now you can switch working state from the widget, no need to open the container App.
• Add a new type of customized policy, 'static policy'.
• Add a new tab called 'switch' for iPhone, it will only appear if you create at least one static policy.

• Fix home view map clip issue(Right side of the map has been clipped a little bit in old versions). 
• Fix a UDP relay issue.

• Added a beautiful red theme(also works on widget) for the upcoming Valentine's Day & Spring Festival, you can switch to it at "More - Theme". Hope you enjoy it.
• The "Switch" tab item will also be visible for iPhone if the count of server is more than or equals to 2(In version 2.1.4 it only appears when you added at least one static policy).

• Added a beautiful red theme(also works on widget) for the upcoming Valentine's Day & Spring Festival, you can switch to it at "More - Theme". Hope you enjoy it.
• The "Switch" tab item will also be visible for iPhone if the count of server is more than or equals to 2(In version 2.1.4 it only appears when you added at least one static policy).

UI
• Two more themes(blue and pink), including App Icons(iOS 10.3 or later).

Features
• Add support for proxy protocol HTTP(over TLS).
• Add support for proxy protocol SOCKS5(over TLS).

Improvements
• Quantumult will ignore URL rejection settings when works in GLOBAL or DIRECT state.
• General fixes.

UI
• Two more themes(blue and pink), including App Icons(iOS 10.3 or later).

Features
• Add support for proxy protocol HTTP(over TLS).
• Add support for proxy protocol SOCKS5(over TLS).

Improvements
• Quantumult will ignore URL rejection settings when works in GLOBAL or DIRECT state.
• General fixes.

Features
• Add feature "URL Rewrite".

Improvements
• You can now adjust the listening port when Quantumult works as a HTTP proxy server for other devices under the same Wi-Fi(More - Accessibility - Port).
• Fix an issue when parsing HTTP requests.

Features
• Add feature "URL Rewrite".

Improvements
• You can now adjust the listening port when Quantumult works as a HTTP proxy server for other devices under the same Wi-Fi(More - Accessibility - Port).
• Fix an issue when parsing HTTP requests.
